titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the reduction by waiver of retired pay due to receipt of compensation or pension not apply to retired pay attributable to pay for extraordinary heroism.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4836-4837)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

bill.summary: 4/26/1994--Introduced. Excludes additional pay for extraordinary heroism from any required reduction in retired pay of a veteran due to the receipt of additional income.
